TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MultiBinding extends System.Windows.Data.BindingBase implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class MultiBinding Inherits BindingBase Implements IAddChild
public ref class MultiBinding : System::Windows::Data::BindingBase, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild
type MultiBinding = class inherit BindingBase interface IAddChild

summary.span: 描述附加至單一繫結目標屬性的 物件集合。

span.span: Describes a collection of objects attached to a single binding target property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定多個繫結中的物件。You can specify multiple bindings in a object. 當您使用物件轉換子，它會產生這些繫結的值為基礎的繫結目標的最後一個值。When you use the object with a converter, it produces a final value for the binding target based on the values of those bindings. 例如，色彩可能會計算來自紅色、 藍色以及綠色值，可以是來自相同或不同的繫結來源物件的值。For example, color might be computed from red, blue, and green values, which can be values from the same or different binding source objects. 值，當移動時從目標到來源，目標屬性值會轉譯成一組回送入繫結的值。When a value moves from the target to the sources, the target property value is translated to a set of values that are fed back into the bindings. 值並屬性會決定功能的，除非個別的繫結會覆寫這些屬性的預設值為使用集合中的所有繫結。The values of the and properties determine the functionality of the and are used as the default values for all the bindings in the collection unless an individual binding overrides these properties. 比方說，如果上的屬性物件設定為，然後在集合中的所有繫結會被視為除非您設定不同上其中一個繫結的值明確。For example, if the property on the object is set to , then all the bindings in the collection are considered unless you set a different value on one of the bindings explicitly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和屬性。For more information, see the and properties. 目前僅支援類型 的物件，而非 或 。 currently supports only objects of type and not or .

value.span: 將 子系加入 物件中會隱含將子系加入 物件的 集合。

span.span: Adding a child to a object implicitly adds the child to the collection for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此屬性可以在設定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]只能藉由使用的語法，就會顯示，或藉由存取的集合物件，使用的各種方法，例如`Add`。This property can be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] only by using the syntax that is shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods, such as `Add`. 用來存取的集合物件的屬性是唯讀，而該集合本身是讀取/寫入。The property used to access the collection object is read-only, whereas the collection itself is read/write. ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreBindings**oneOrMoreBindings* 一或多個物件。One or more objects.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出此繫結資料流程的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the direction of the data flow of this binding.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設值為 ，它會傳回目標相依性屬性的預設繫結模式值。

span.span: The default value is , which returns the default binding mode value of the target dependency property.

value.span: 但是每個相依性屬性的預設值都不同。

span.span: However, the default value varies for each dependency property.

value.span: 一般而言，使用者可以編輯的控制項屬性，例如 ，預設為雙向繫結，而其他大多數屬性則預設為單向繫結。

span.span: In general, user-editable control properties, such as , default to two-way bindings, whereas most other properties default to one-way bindings.

value.span: 判斷相依性屬性預設是否會單向或雙向繫結的程式設計方式是，使用 取得屬性的屬性中繼資料，然後檢查 屬性的布林值。

span.span: A programmatic way to determine whether a dependency property binds one-way or two-way by default is to get the property metadata of the property using and then check the Boolean value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值並屬性會決定功能的，除非個別的繫結會覆寫這些屬性的預設值為使用集合中的所有繫結。The values of the and properties determine the functionality of the and are used as the default values for all the bindings in the collection unless an individual binding overrides these properties. 比方說，如果上的屬性物件設定為，然後在集合中的所有繫結會被視為除非您設定不同上其中一個繫結的值明確。For example, if the property on the object is set to , then all the bindings in the collection are considered unless you set a different value on one of the bindings explicitly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和屬性。For more information, see the and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因為屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 您通常叫用這個方法如果您正在開發的設計工具或是開發您自己的控制項併入。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .

summary.span: 取得或設定可用來提供自訂邏輯的處理常式，以處理繫結引擎在更新繫結來源值期間所遇到的例外狀況。

span.span: Gets or sets a handler you can use to provide custom logic for handling exceptions that the binding engine encounters during the update of the binding source value.

summary.span: 只有 與 物件已建立關聯性才適用。

span.span: This is only applicable if you have associated the with your object.

value.span: 提供自訂邏輯以處理繫結引擎在更新繫結來源值期間所遇到之例外狀況的方法。

span.span: A method that provides custom logic for handling exceptions that the binding engine encounters during the update of the binding source value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表內建驗證規則會檢查繫結來源屬性更新期間所擲回的例外狀況。The class represents a built-in validation rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the update of the binding source properties. 如果您已建立關聯物件與您物件，您可以使用這個屬性設定來提供自訂邏輯來處理這些例外狀況處理常式。If you have associated the object with your object, you can use this property to set a handler to provide custom logic for handling these exceptions. 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see . 如需詳細資訊，驗證程序的相關物件，請參閱屬性。For more information about the validation process for objects, see the property.

value.span: 不過，大多數相依性屬性的預設值為 ，而 屬性具有 的預設值。

span.span: However, the default value for most dependency properties is , while the property has a default value of .

value.span: 一種判斷相依性屬性之預設 值的程式設計方式是使用 取得屬性的屬性中繼資料，然後再檢查 屬性的值。

span.span: A programmatic way to determine the default value of a dependency property is to get the property metadata of the property using and then check the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值並屬性會決定功能的，除非個別的繫結會覆寫這些屬性的預設值為使用集合中的所有繫結。The values of the and properties determine the functionality of the and are used as the default values for all the bindings in the collection unless an individual binding overrides these properties. 比方說，如果上的屬性物件設定為，然後在集合中的所有繫結會被視為除非您設定不同上其中一個繫結的值明確。For example, if the property on the object is set to , then all the bindings in the collection are considered unless you set a different value on one of the bindings explicitly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和屬性。For more information, see the and properties.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要包含 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the .

value.span: 表示包含 ，否則為 。

span.span: to include the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性提供替代使用項目明確。Setting this property provides an alternative to using the element explicitly. 是內建驗證規則會檢查所引發的錯誤來源物件的實作。The is a built-in validation rule that checks for errors that are raised by the implementation of the source object. 如果會引發錯誤，就會建立繫結引擎發生錯誤並將它加入繫結元素的集合。If an error is raised, the binding engine creates a with the error and adds it to the collection of the bound element. 錯誤缺乏會清除這個驗證回應，除非另一個規則就會發出驗證問題。The lack of an error clears this validation feedback, unless another rule raises a validation issue. 如需詳細資訊，驗證程序的相關物件，請參閱屬性。For more information about the validation process for objects, see the property. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性提供替代使用項目明確。Setting this property provides an alternative to using the element explicitly. 是內建驗證規則會檢查來源屬性更新期間所擲回的例外狀況。The is a built-in validation rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the update of the source property. 如果擲回例外狀況，就會建立繫結引擎與例外狀況並將它加入繫結元素的集合。If an exception is thrown, the binding engine creates a with the exception and adds it to the collection of the bound element. 錯誤缺乏會清除這個驗證回應，除非另一個規則就會發出驗證問題。The lack of an error clears this validation feedback, unless another rule raises a validation issue. 如需詳細資訊，驗證程序的相關物件，請參閱屬性。For more information about the validation process for objects, see the property. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ValidationRules As Collection(Of ValidationRule)

summary.span: 取得 這個執行個體的 物件集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of objects for this instance of .

value.span: 這個執行個體的 物件集合。

span.span: The collection of objects for this instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定驗證規則，兩者物件，並個別中的物件物件。You can set validation rules on both the object and the individual objects in the object. 繫結引擎會評估上物件時從繫結目標屬性的值會移物件。The binding engine evaluates the on the object when a value moves from the binding target property to the object. 在那之後，從轉換器移到個別的繫結的繫結來源屬性的值時，繫結引擎會評估該物件。After that, when a value moves from the converter to the binding source property of an individual binding, the binding engine evaluates the on that object. 多個驗證程序，以及如何提供視覺化回饋時失效的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 資料驗證 」，在[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information about the validation process and how to provide visual feedback upon invalidation, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). > [!NOTE] > 此屬性可以在設定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]只能藉由使用語法所示，或藉由存取的集合物件，使用的各種方法，例如`Add`。This property can be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] only by using the syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods, such as `Add`. 用來存取的集合物件的屬性是唯讀，而該集合本身是讀寫。The property used to access the collection object is read-only, whereas the collection itself is read-write. ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreValidationRules**oneOrMoreValidationRules* 一或多個物件。One or more objects. 您可以使用類別或子類別化來建立您的自訂規則類別。You can use the class or create your custom rules by subclassing the class.

span.span: Binding Validation Sample
